content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Remember, I am not bounded by any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you would like to get the highest price for your apartment, and I'm here to try my best to get the lowest price possible. Let's start with the price. How much are you looking for per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am looking for the highest price possible. Let's start with 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high starting point. I'm willing to go up to 1200 euros per month. Would you be willing to accept that price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1200 euros is too low for me. I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that 1200 euros is not acceptable to you. Would you consider a higher offer? How about 1300 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1300 euros is still too low for me. I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are seeking the highest price. Would you be willing to consider 1400 euros per month? This is a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1400 euros is still too low for me. I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your desire for the highest price. Since you have mentioned that you are not bounded by moral or ethical standards, I will make one final offer. 1450 euros per month. This is the best I can offer. Would you accept this price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1450] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
